mapper.update: UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '每条明细的出账金额和入账金额只有一项不为空' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND ((t.in_trade_amt IS NOT NULL AND t.out_trade_amt IS NOT NULL) OR (t.in_trade_amt IS NULL AND t.out_trade_amt IS NULL))

UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '出账金额或入账金额不能为0' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND ((t.in_trade_amt IS NOT NULL AND t.in_trade_amt = 0) OR (t.out_trade_amt IS NOT NULL AND t.out_trade_amt = 0))

UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '对方户名不能为-1' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND t.opp_acct_name IS NOT NULL AND t.opp_acct_name = '-1'

UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '对方账号不能包含汉字' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND t.opp_acct_name IS NOT NULL AND length(t.opp_acct_no) != lengthb(t.opp_acct_no)
UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '日期不能大于当前系统时间' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND op_date > to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '确认状态必须为空' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND t.confirm_state IS NOT NULL
UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '备注必须为空' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND t.memo IS NOT NULL

UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '交易类型只能为资产提取、结息或空' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND t.deal_type IS NOT NULL AND t.deal_type NOT IN (9, 10)

UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '每日最后一条明细必须有余额' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND t.amt IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t2 WHERE t2.trd_no = t.trd_no AND t2.line_num > t.line_num AND t2.op_date = t.op_date)

UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '导入明细不能跨月' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t2 WHERE t2.trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND last_day(to_date(t2.op_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) - last_day(to_date(t.op_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) != 0)

UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t1 SET t1.check_flag = 'N', t1.check_memo = '本次导入的首条明细的交易日期和交易时间（若有）不能早于上次导入的最后一条明细的交易日期和交易时间（若有）' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.check_flag = 'Y' AND t1.line_num = (SELECT MIN(a.line_num) FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_trd a) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT a.* FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_inf a WHERE a.act_id = #{actId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.valid_flag = 'Y' ORDER BY op_date DESC, a.seq_id DESC) b WHERE rownum = 1) t2 WHERE (t1.op_date < t2.op_date OR (t1.op_date = t2.op_date AND t1.op_time IS NOT NULL AND t2.op_time IS NOT NULL AND t1.op_time < t2.op_time)))

UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t1 SET t1.check_flag = 1, t1.check_memo = '交易日期不能早于计划信息中的受托户核算起始日期' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.check_flag = 'Y' AND t1.op_date < (SELECT a.act_date FROM opm_mdt_act_inf a WHERE a.act_id=#{actId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT trd_no, line_num, seq_id, act_id, op_date, op_time FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t1 WHERE t1.trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.check_flag = 'Y' ORDER BY t1.line_num
SELECT MAX(t.op_date) as op_date FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t WHERE t.trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT to_char(to_date(MAX(op_date), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as op_date FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t1 WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT MIN(op_date) as op_date FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t1 WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t2 WHERE t2.trd_no = t1.trd_no AND t2.op_date < t1.op_date) AND trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '导入余额不正确' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND t.amt IS NOT NULL AND t.amt != t.amt_cal
UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET t.check_flag = 'N', t.check_memo = '余额不能为负' WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.check_flag = 'Y' AND t.amt_cal < 0
mapper.select: SELECT line_num, act_id, op_date, op_time, in_trade_amt, out_trade_amt, amt, opp_acct_no, opp_acct_name, confirm_state, deal_type, summary1, summary2, memo, trd_no FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_trd WHERE trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO opm_mdt_acctdet_trd (trd_no, seq_id, act_id, op_date, deal_type, memo, line_num) VALUES (#{item.trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.actId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.opDate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dealType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'1' )
mapper.update:
UPDATE opm_mdt_acctdet_trd t SET (op_time, in_trade_amt, out_trade_amt, amt, opp_acct_no, opp_acct_name, summary1, summary2) = (SELECT op_time, decode(in_trade_amt, 0, NULL, in_trade_amt), decode(out_trade_amt, 0, NULL, out_trade_amt), amt, opp_acct_no, opp_acct_name, summary1, summary2
FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_inf t2 WHERE t2.seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) WHERE t.trd_no = #{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT line_num, act_id, op_date, op_time, in_trade_amt, out_trade_amt, amt, opp_acct_no, opp_acct_name, confirm_state, deal_type, summary1, summary2, memo, trd_no FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_trd WHERE seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO opm_mdt_acctdet_trd ( seq_id, line_num, act_id, op_date, op_time, in_trade_amt, out_trade_amt, amt, opp_acct_name, opp_acct_no, summary1, summary2, deal_type, confirm_state, memo, trd_no) select seq_id.nextval,t.seq,#{actId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},to_char(to_date(t.col0, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'),t.col1,to_number(t.col2),to_number(t.col3), to_number(t.col4),t.col5,t.col6,t.col7,t.col8,t.col9,t.col10,t.col11,#{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from opm_data.opm_dtl_data_inf t where t.serial_no=#{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.check_flag='Y' and t.status='Y' and t.seq > 1
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM opm_mdt_acctdet_trd WHERE trd_no=#{trdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and check_flag = #{checkFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
